summary: INSTRUMENT PANEL WILL NOT LIGHT UP AT ALL.  THE GUAGES WILL NOT ILLUMINATED, YOU CANNOT TELL HOW FAST YOU ARE GOING, HOW MUCH GAS YOU HAVE, OR IF THERE ARE HAVE BEEN ANY TYPE OF ENGINE FAILURES, BRAKE FAILURES, ETC.  THIS CONTINUES FOR DAYS TO WEEKS AT A TIME.  THIS IS WORSE AT NIGHT, YOUR COMPLETELY IN THE DARK, YOU CAN'T EVEN SEE WHAT GEAR YOUR IN -  IT IS VERY DANGEROUS.
